54 void generate_move(const pumpkin_messages::SSCMoveList & move) {
55  if (move.list.size() > 0) {
56  std::stringstream comm_mount;
57  for (auto it : move.list) {
58  if (it.pulse != 0 && (it.pulse < min_pulse[it.channel] || it.pulse > max_pulse[it.channel])) {
59  ROS_WARN("Received a move command to move the channel %d outbound. Review command or robot calibration.",
60  it.channel);
61  continue;
62  }
63  comm_mount << "# " << int(it.channel) << " P " << it.pulse;
64  if (it.speed > 0)
65  comm_mount << " S " << it.speed;
66  comm_mount << ' ';
67  }
68  if (move.time > 0)
69  comm_mount << "T " << move.time;
70 
71  comm_mount << '\r';
72 
73  if (debug_flag)
74  ROS_INFO("Command: %s", comm_mount.str().c_str());
75  else
76  ssc->write(comm_mount.str());
77  } else {
78  std::stringstream off_comm;
79  for (int i = 0; i < 32; ++i)
80  off_comm << '#' << i << " P 0 ";
81  off_comm << '\r';
82 
83  if (debug_flag)
84  ROS_INFO("Command: %s", off_comm.str().c_str());
85  else
86  ssc->write(off_comm.str());
87  }
88 }
89 
104 bool moveSSC(pumpkin_messages::SSCMoveCommand::Request &req, pumpkin_messages::SSCMoveCommand::Response &res) {
105  unsigned char serial_in = '+';
106  ros::Duration d(0.01);
107  try {
108  while (serial_in == '+') {
109  ssc->write("Q\r");
110  ssc->read(&serial_in, 1);
111  ssc->flushInput();
112  d.sleep();
113  }
114  } catch (serial::PortNotOpenedException) {
115  if (!setupSSC())
116  return false;
117  } catch (serial::SerialException) {
118  ROS_ERROR("Error trying to read SSC status. Trying to connect again.");
119  if (!setupSSC())
120  return false;
121  }
122 
123  if (serial_in != '.')
124  if (!setupSSC())
125  return false;
126 
127  try {
128  generate_move(req.move);
129  } catch (serial::IOException e) {
130  ROS_ERROR("IOException ocurred. Error: %s.", e.what());
131  return false;
132  } catch (serial::PortNotOpenedException) {
133  ROS_ERROR("The serial connection was closed during the transmission. Check connection status.");
134  return false;
135  } catch (serial::SerialException e) {
136  ROS_ERROR("Error in serial connection. Error message: %s.", e.what());
137  return false;
138  }
139  return true;
140 }
141 
142 bool setupSSC() {
143  if (ssc)
144  delete ssc;
145  FILE *pipe = popen(("setserial -g "+port+"*").c_str(), "r");
146  char buffer[128];
147  std::string console = "";
148  while(!feof(pipe)) {
149  if(fgets(buffer, 128, pipe) != NULL)
150  console += buffer;
151  }
152 
153  pclose(pipe);
154 
155  //Separate ports into a vector of strings
156  std::vector<std::string> port_list;
157  std::string buf;
158  for (std::string::iterator it = console.begin(); it != console.end(); ++it)
159  {
160  if (*it != '\n')
161  buf += *it;
162  else
163  {
164  size_t pos;
165  if ((pos = buf.find("UART")) != std::string::npos) //If found UART
166  {
167  port_list.push_back(buf.substr(0, pos-2));
168  }
169  buf.clear();
170  }
171  }
172 
173  if (!port_list.size()) {
174  ROS_INFO("There is no any serial device in any port of type: %s", port.c_str());
175  return false;
176  }
177 
178  std::string ver;
179  for (std::vector<std::string>::iterator it = port_list.begin(); it != port_list.end(); ++it)
180  {
181  try {
182  ssc = new serial::Serial(*it, 115200, serial::Timeout::simpleTimeout(1000));
183  //ssc = new SimpleSerial(*it, 115200);
184  //ROS_INFO("Start serial on port: %s", (*it).c_str());
185  ssc->write("VER\r");
186  ssc->readline(ver, 65536, "\r");
187  if (ver.find("SSC") != std::string::npos) {
188  ros::param::set("/pumpkin/ssc_serial_port", (*it).c_str());
189  ROS_INFO("SSC found on port: %s", (*it).c_str());
190  return true;
191  }
192  } catch (serial::PortNotOpenedException) {
193  if (ssc)
194  delete ssc;
195  continue;
196  } catch (serial::IOException) {
197  ROS_WARN("Error trying to communicate with the port %s.", (*it).c_str());
198  if (ssc)
199  delete ssc;
200  continue;
201  } catch (serial::SerialException e) {
202  ROS_WARN("Error trying to read or write on serial. Error message: %s.", e.what());
203  delete ssc;
204  continue;
205  }
206  delete ssc;
207  }
208 
209  return false;
210 }

221 int main (int argc, char *argv[]) {
222  // Initialize ROS.
223  ros::init(argc, argv, "setup_ssc");
224  ros::param::param<std::string>("~port", port, "/dev/ttyUSB");
225  ros::NodeHandle service_handle, topic_handle;
226 
227  if (argc > 1) {
228  if (!std::string(argv[1]).compare("debug")) {
229  debug_flag = true;
230  ROS_WARN("You are running \"setup_ssc\" in debug mode. All commands will be shown here.");
231  ROS_WARN("To send commands to pumpkin, please, run without debug argumment.");
232  } else {
233  ROS_INFO("You can run this node in debug mode to show commands here instead of sending them to pumpkin.");
234  ROS_INFO("To do so, just run this node with debug argumment, like: \"rosrun pumpkin_interface setup_ssc debug\".");
235  }
236  }
237 
238  ROS_INFO("Looking for ssc on ports of type: %s", port.c_str());
239  if (!setupSSC()) {
240  ROS_FATAL("SSC not found! Check your connections and try again.");
241  return -1;
242  }
243 
244  ros::Rate loop(1000);
245  while(!ros::param::has("/pumpkin/config")) {
246  loop.sleep();
247  //ROS_WARN("Cannot find robot configuration. Please run \"load_config\".");
248  }
249 
250  XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue config;
251 
252  ros::param::get("/pumpkin/config/ssc", config);
253 
254  typedef XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::iterator xml_iterator;
255  for (xml_iterator block_it = config.begin(); block_it != config.end(); ++block_it) {
256  //ROS_INFO("%s", block_it->first.c_str());
257  for (xml_iterator part_it = block_it->second.begin(); part_it != block_it->second.end(); ++part_it) {
258  int pin = int(part_it->second["pin"]);
259  min_pulse[pin] = int(part_it->second["pulse_min"]);
260  max_pulse[pin] = int(part_it->second["pulse_max"]);
261  //rest_pulse[pin] = int(part_it->second["pulse_rest"]);
262  //ROS_INFO("%d", pin);
263  }
264  }
265 
266  ros::CallbackQueue service_queue, topic_queue;
267 
268  service_handle.setCallbackQueue(&service_queue);
269  topic_handle.setCallbackQueue(&topic_queue);
270 
271  ros::ServiceServer srv = service_handle.advertiseService("move_ssc", moveSSC);
272  ros::Subscriber subs = topic_handle.subscribe("move_ssc_topic", 1024, generate_move);
273 
274  double rate;
275  ros::param::get("/pumpkin/config/ros_rate", rate);
276  loop = ros::Rate(rate);
277 
278  while (ros::ok()) {
279 
280  if (service_queue.callOne(ros::WallDuration(0)) == ros::CallbackQueue::Called) {
281  service_queue.callAvailable(ros::WallDuration(0));
282  ROS_INFO("Service called.");
283  } else {
284  topic_queue.callAvailable(ros::WallDuration(0));
285  //ROS_INFO("Topic called.");
286  }
287  loop.sleep();
288  }
289 
290  return 0;
291 }
